howWeUseYourInformation.contactInfo: We will use your contact info for subscription updates & Metaintro news and jobs.
howWeUseYourInformation.prefill: We may pre-filll your contact information from various sources for easier registration. You are able to edit or delete it. Prefill contact information can come from:
howWeUseYourInformation.thirdParty: Third-party services we use may collect information for their own purposes. Check their privacy policies for details.
howWeUseYourInformation.thisForm: We collect information you provide (like name and email) and device information (like IP address) to improve our services and deliver targeted ads. We will use your contact info for subscription updates, Metaintro news, email newsletters, job notifications, and advertisements.
howWeUseYourInformation.title: How We Use Your Information?
howWeUseYourInformation.unsubscribe: You can opt out of targeted advertising and unsubscribe from our marketing emails whenever you want. In every email you receive from Metaintro, there will be an Unsubscribe option in the footer, as required by law.
howWeUseYourInformation.updateDisclaimer: We may update this disclaimer at any time, so please review it regularly.

errors.invalidEmailAddress: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidEmailAddressLatin: Please enter a valid email address in Latin characters only (a-z, A-Z, 0-9)
